org.apache.hadoop.lib.serverの使用

  • org.apache.hadoop.fs.http.serverにより使用されるorg.apache.hadoop.lib.serverのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    Server
    A Server class provides standard configuration, logging and Service lifecyle management.
    ServerException
    Exception thrown by the Server class.
  • org.apache.hadoop.lib.serverにより使用されるorg.apache.hadoop.lib.serverのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    Server
    A Server class provides standard configuration, logging and Service lifecyle management.
    Server.Status
    Enumeration that defines the server status.
    ServerException
    Exception thrown by the Server class.
    ServerException.ERROR
    Error codes use by the Server class.
    Service
    Service interface for components to be managed by the Server class.
    ServiceException
    Exception thrown by Service implementations.
  • org.apache.hadoop.lib.service.hadoopにより使用されるorg.apache.hadoop.lib.serverのクラス 
    クラスと説明
    BaseService
    Convenience class implementing the Service interface.
    Service
    Service interface for components to be managed by the Server class.
    ServiceException
    Exception thrown by Service implementations.
